summary.description:
Computer-assisted Recognition and Identification of Bottlenose Dolphin Photos in R.

Dolphin Recognition via Automated Cropping Tracing and... in haimeh/finFindR.

‘finFindR’, is an R package that identifies wild dolphins using photographs of the nicks and notches on their dorsal fins.

finFindR offers the capacity to automatically crop and trace images for recognition work.

finFindR-package: Dolphin Recognition via Automated Cropping Tracing and..
summary.name: finFindR
